abstract: The software company followed three large electric utilities out the door in a disagreement with the chamber’s climate policy.
snippet: The software company followed three large electric utilities out the door in a disagreement with the chamber’s climate policy.
lead_paragraph: Apple has become the latest company to resign from the United States Chamber of Commerce over climate policy.

headline.main: Apple Resigns From U.S. Chamber of Commerce
headline.print_headline: Apple Resigns From U.S. Chamber of Commerce

abstract: AT&T said it would not prevent iPhone users from using Web telephone services that bypass its own voice network.
snippet: AT&T said it would not prevent iPhone users from using Web telephone services that bypass its own voice network.
lead_paragraph: AT&T said on Tuesday that it would no longer prevent customers with the Apple iPhone from using Internet telephone services that bypass its own voice network.

headline.main: AT&T Reverses Policy on iPhone Internet Calls
headline.print_headline: AT&T to Let iPhone Users Make Calls on the Internet
